label: Note
comment: A textual or coded description, such as a remark or additional information.

datatypeProperties.comment: A content, expressed as text, of this note.
A code specifying the content of this note.
A unique identifier for this note.
A code specifying the subject of this note.
The subject, expressed as text, of this note.

referencedBy.comment: An additional information note included for this financing request document.
